EmailTemplate.subject: TWO WEEKS Until Final Payment is Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Volunteers!
This is just a reminder about the following items:
Payment Deadline:
There are two weeks left to fundraise for your trip. Remember to share your Canada Helps page and finish all of your fundraising plans.
$300 deposit should already be on your page to secure your spot.
$1,995 is due May 1st, 2014
Booking your flights:
When booking flights, please book them to Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic - Airport Code: POP
Once you have booked your flights, please forward me the flight itinerary that your airline sent you.
Travel Insurance:
Please provide me with the following:
Insurance Provider
Policy #
Phone number
Thanks to all of you who have already sent in the above information!
Live Different Store
We're very excited to introduce to you our Live Different store! http://store.livedifferent.com/
What's the best part about purchasing a t-shirt? The proceeds of Live Different's merchandise sales go directly towards our charitable projects.
Have a great day everyone!
Jenn Digiandomenico
Program Administrator
